core.comp3111

Class DataTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.comp3111.DataTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DataTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    2D array of data values with the following requirements: (1) There are 0 to many columns (2) The number of row for each column is the same (3) 2 columns may have different type (e.g. String and Number). (4) A column can be uniquely identified by its column name (5) add/remove a column is supported (6) Suitable exception handling is implemented
    Author:
    cspeter
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addCol

        public void addCol(java.lang.String colName,
                   DataColumn newCol)
            throws DataTableException
        Add a data column to the table.
        Parameters:
        colName - - name of the column. It should be a unique identifier
        newCol - - the data column
        Throws:
        DataTableException - - It throws DataTableException if a column is already exist, or the row size does not match.

      • removeCol

        public void removeCol(java.lang.String colName)
               throws DataTableException
        Remove a column from the data table
        Parameters:
        colName - - The column name. It should be a unique identifier
        Throws:
        DataTableException - - It throws DataTableException if the column does not exist

      • getCol

        public DataColumn getCol(java.lang.String colName)
        Get the DataColumn object based on the give colName. Return null if the column does not exist
        Parameters:
        colName - The column name
        Returns:
        DataColumn reference or null

      • containsColumn

        public boolean containsColumn(java.lang.String colName)
        Check whether the column exists by the given column name
        Parameters:
        colName - - the column name that the user wants to check
        Returns:
        true if the column exists, false otherwise

      • getNumRow

        public int getNumRow()
